body: @jac1013 it's yours now, please proceed keeping in mind [our principles](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles). Feel free to ask any technical questions right here in the ticket
@jac1013 The budget of this task is **30 mins**. This is exactly how much time will be compensated, when the task is completed.
@dmarkov please assign someone else to this issue

> @dmarkov please assign someone else to this issue

@yegor256 someone else will help in this task, no problem at all
@asinyagin please pick this up, and keep in mind [these instructions](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/intro). Any technical questions - ask right here
@asinyagin The cost of this task is **30 mins** (this is exactly how much will be paid, not less not more), when the task is done
@asinyagin we're waiting for your feedback, please keep us posted on your progress
@dmarkov this issue is blocked by #220. Pull request #261 for the issue #220 hasn't been merged.

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)
